Header.paragraph: Empowering students with immersive, interactive learning experiences through Augmented Reality in Education.

About.paragraph:
Welcome to playARground, where we are transforming the educational landscape through immersive Augmented Reality experiences. Our mission is to provide personalized, accessible, and engaging learning tools for students of all ages and abilities, including those with disabilities. By integrating interactive 3D models and immersive content, we aim to bridge the educational gap, making learning more effective and enjoyable.
At playARground, we believe in the power of technology to create equal learning opportunities and enhance academic outcomes. Join us in revolutionizing education, one immersive experience at a time!.

Features.title: Immersive 3D Learning Models
Features.text: playARground offers interactive 3D models in various subjects like human anatomy and jet engines, providing students with an engaging, hands-on learning experience.

Features.title: Marker-Based and Markerless AR
Features.text: The application supports both marker-based AR (requires reference images) and markerless AR, allowing flexibility in how students interact with educational content.

Features.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility
Features.text: Built using Unity, AR Core, and AR Foundation, the application ensures seamless functionality across different devices, offering a consistent learning experience.

Features.title: Interactive Learning Environment
Features.text: Students can explore complex subjects like anatomy and engineering through real-time interaction with AR models, making learning more immersive and dynamic.
